website_summaries.verdict: One of the most highly rated grooming tables on the market, this stand is simple but functional.
pros: Available in 3 different sizes for all dog shapes
Long legs include rubber feet for nonskid work
Grooming arm adjusts up to 40 inches
cons: Many owners had problems with the table arriving with broken or damaged screws, making assembly difficult

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional groomer and I work at a shop. I use this table at my home to groom friends dogs or special customers. I think it is a good value for the money and the table is very sturdy. It doesn't wobble at all! Which is awesome. The arm is removeable and adjustable and I think the table is a good height. I am rather short though, only 5'4. The only thing I don't like is the loop that is included. Dogs can still get out of it and it wouldn't be good for a bad dog. But you can purchase those separately for a small amount. Overall I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hales

customer_reviews.title: Go Pet Club Dog Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: Solid and heavy grooming table, it will probably last forever. If you get the complete kit with clippers, blades, combs ,brushes, scissors etc. you will have quite a lot of money out, so don't go there unless you intend to persevere and learn how to "Do it Yourself". Over time you will save yourself a lot of money. However, in the early days your dog might look like it came out of a freak show, until you develop the skills needed for a professional result every time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it for our standard poodle
customer_reviews.text: This table is wonderful. Very sturdy and my dog fits on it great. She's a standard poodle just under 40lbs. When I saw that the clamp that attaches the arm to the table was made of plastic I was concerned as older ones are metal, but it's very sturdy, everything has stayed in place during grooming, and I don't see it being a problem at all. I really appreciate the non-slip surface. There's been no slipping or sliding.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Keeshond puppy and grooming him was like trying to brush a rolling alligator! Once this table arrived and I slipped the lead around his neck, he stood there like a champ and let me groom him from head to tail. I should have purchased one of these tables years ago with the other double coated dogs we've owned, because grooming them as often as they need it couldn't be easier. I brush out my dog 3 to 4 times a week and without this table it would be drudgery. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: The Jayes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic basic grooming table
customer_reviews.text: I've had this table for over 6 years now, and it's seen full time use for the last 3 of them. The only breakage is from the dogs I groom, not from the product itself (one big dog broke the arm off, he didn't want his nails clipped). It folds up easily although it would be completely perfect with a handle but as a stationary table it's fantastic. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. My dog is 55 pounds , I got the 36 inches. Its' very stable, easy to open and easy storage. It's heavy but this make it stronger. It doesn't wobble. I am 5"4 feet. I thought it was a little high for me, but it worked out just fine. The leash is thin, but my dog doesn't move so no problem there. The arm holding the leash is strong. This table will last forever so I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Well made and will pay for itself quickly.
customer_reviews.text: With virus quarantine couldn't go to groomer, so tried this table. Worked great! Sturdy and overall construction excellent. Buyers should know it's a good chunk of metal and composite board, so assistance to move it around may be needed by lighter folks. An improvement would be to tap the stainless base tube so the welded nut, the only real potential for rust on the table, could be eliminated.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog grooming table. Well made and very sturdy. Nice rubber top that gives pet good footing. It’s heavy but very stable! No complaints from me!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: good room to groom
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and grooming them while sitting on the floor was getting a bit old... This is what I needed oh, and this is what they needed. The table is very sturdy and because my dogs are quite small, it allows me enough space to have them sit comfortably and place my grooming tools.
customer_reviews.author: Moniquins

customer_reviews.title: This table is terrific
customer_reviews.text: This is the second table I have ordered. I originally purchased the smaller size but eventually upgraded to fit my golden doodle on it as well as my smaller dogs. Great quality, very sturdy and easy to clean.i would recommend this item for those that want to have a great place to groom their pets.
customer_reviews.author: Angela in MN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well made table
customer_reviews.text: This is my first grooming table purchase and I am so glad I chose this table! The table is very well made. The legs are not flimsy and they really lock into place well. The tabletop is covered in a very nice material that will make clean up a breeze. Everything went together very easily and I am very happy with the overall quality. I would certainly recommend this table to anyone looking for a good, solid grooming table.
customer_reviews.author: T.Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: You can groom; you just think you can't.
customer_reviews.text: When my Airedale's haircut started costing as much as mine, I decided to start grooming her myself. This was my first step. It is durable, lightweight and a cost saver. Very little money to invest in a big cost savings.
customer_reviews.author: sadie pack

customer_reviews.title: A quality, sturdy grooming table!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice home grooming table. I use it every day and have been extremely happy with how it's held up. It's sturdy, it's secure, and easy to clean. Only problem with the table itself is that it is heavy and awkward to put up, so I leave it set up rather than taking it down daily. The neck loop didn't do anything for me (my dog got out of it in like 2 minutes) and I don't use it. The table itself however is very nice. Would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Blue's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: The table is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The clamp for the arm is alright. Not the strongest clamp, but it holds the arm. Wish it came with an extra loop noose. Nonetheless, I was able to groom my little furbabies. Saved me time and money. I can finally groom my little furries.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: weird sticky plastic around edges that is hard/impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: table is nice but the "protective" film around the top edge is impossible to remove completely.
customer_reviews.author: MLJ

customer_reviews.title: Great grooming table
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, glad I bought it. I have a 8 month old 27 lb English cocker spaniel. Used to trim him outside on a table. This is soooo much better especially that it's cold now. Table comes assemblied except for the arm. Easy set up . Table top surface is was easy to clean. Very well built easy to fold together. Yes it's not lite weight but if you want sturdy this is the table for you. Researched on line and at pet stores for long time I bought this table.I'd buy it again without a second thought.
customer_reviews.author: john p. schneiderTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable arm
customer_reviews.text: I have a Soft Coated Wheaten Terrier and decided to learn to groom him myself. For the price, I couldn't believe how solid this table is! Around 30-35 lbs., metal surface with a rubber mat so the dog doesn't slip. My dog is 42 lbs. and when he starts to wiggle on the table it stands steady. Nice adjustable arm, strap and clamp. The only suggestion I would make for improvement is the clamp is plastic and would be sturdier if it was metal.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent!
customer_reviews.text: This paid for itself the first time I used it. My dog doesn’t mind me clipping her she is just not inclined to stand patiently while I do it. This saved me from having to find and pay an arm and a leg for a groomer. It also saved me many a backache!
customer_reviews.author: Channon W.

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: The right size to fit in the space available in my home. For my two 9 pound doglegs. Still getting used to putting them in a cat restraint zipper back to do their nails.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great table - Very stable
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to make this purchase? The table is very stable, the arm and arm attachment is rock solid, and set-up/folding the table up was as easy as can be. Another review said the table did not come with a harness to attach to the arm - I did receive a harness with my table. However, it was very lightweight, probably fine for a smaller dog. I purchased a nylon harness thinking one would not be included, but I'm glad - it is much more secure and offers better adjustment than what was included. Great table for a great price! Wish I had purchased it months ago!
customer_reviews.author: TampaLyssie

customer_reviews.title: MISSING GROOMING ARM
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is fine but the description claimed the grooming arm was included. There was a bracket but NO arm. I would not use it as the arm is not as sturdy as the type I use but it still should have been in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Sibelady

customer_reviews.title: Back saver!
customer_reviews.text: It's great not having to sit on the floor and kill my back with shaving my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Alcock

customer_reviews.title: Solid equipment to use
customer_reviews.text: This was our first dog grooming table we've ever purchased. We have a 60 pound golden doodle and she did great on it. Plenty of room to move around and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: terri tiffany

customer_reviews.title: the price is great and I thought it would be flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about this table, the price is great and I thought it would be flimsy. It actually is quite sturdy. I hated the noose because the clasp slides up which may cause a safety issue in some pets. Luckily, you can buy different types. I have done quite a few dogs on this table ranging from 5-100 pounds and it has been sturdy with all of them. This was a great investment for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Renee' S.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional groomer who grooms out of her home overseas on a military base. Shipping here is very limiting and weight limits made it impossible to have a big electric table shipped, like I really wanted. But, this table has met my needs. I got some lifters to help with the height issues, and I've had no troubles. It's easy enough to fold up and down for storage. The table has been durable and held up to having big dogs on it. Its a great product for those who are limited with what kind of table they can have due to shipping or price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height, sturdy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This table is a little heavy to move around, but sturdy. The non slip top also is healthful. My dogs don’t mind being on the table and getting haircuts. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kee

customer_reviews.title: Great table but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great table but came damaged. To much of a pain to return and I figured it'll get banged up eventually anyway but pretty disapointing. It's heavy and durable and stands stable, no tippiness. I'd order another one for sure. Arm is pretty good too. I thought I'd have to replace but it'd held up through three shows so far and I can't find anything I don't like about it. Considering price this is an excellent table i expect to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grooming Table - Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for our 42 pound Aussie mix and 65 pound Labrador. Very sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gayl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grooming table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grooming. My only complaint is, it is very heavy however I suppose to keep it sturdy so it doesn't tip over it has too be heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: This is just my first grooming table and I thought it was perfect for what I use it for. I'm not a professional but this works great for me and the height is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful grooming table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table because it is just the right size and weight. It is small enough to fit into a tight space and nice and heavy. I'd used lighter things like an ironing board to clip my mini poodles because they were the only things tall enough and that I could clip the wire to the clippers up out of the way. The heavy weight of the table keeps it from shaking if there is playing by my dog. This one has it all except I am ordering the leash that has 2 holders for front and back at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this grooming table! I have a 34 lb. soft coated Wheaten Terrier and this works perfectly for her! The table is rock solid and oh so easy to set up. Be sure to lock the legs in place before you set it upright! The packaging was great and the table arrived quickly! I have even taught my dog to jump up onto it and jump off when grooming is done! Saves on the back!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: ... groom my miniature schnauzers myself and this table is perfect. It is level and sturdy and just the ...
customer_reviews.text: I groom my miniature schnauzers myself and this table is perfect. It is level and sturdy and just the right size for the dogs and tools. I lay out what I use on the end for easy access. The loop in the rope came undone and I have no idea how to re-do it but I was planning on purchasing a different style anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT IS A LITTLE STIFF TO OPEN AND CLOSE LEGS.
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE THIS TABLE, ONE OF MY CLIENTS BOUGHT IT DURING SHUT DOWN, WHEN I SAW THIS TABLE ,I LIKED IT IMMEDIATELY. THIS TABLE IS STRONG,SOLID AND EASY TO CLEAN. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TABLE .
customer_reviews.author: saula

customer_reviews.title: It is too short for me to work on comfortably and I will have to put some blocks under ...
customer_reviews.text: I read in another review of this product that the table would adjust to 40 inches and it does not. It is too short for me to work on comfortably and I will have to put some blocks under the legs. The strap was not included. There is some damage to the legs as well. I am disappointed. I have not been able to find out how to contact the seller to resolve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Stacye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home grooming
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it makes grooming our four large dogs at home. This table is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price I felt it wouldn't be as sturdy as my shop equipment but it will be on ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional dog groomer and needed an extra table for at home. I was very surprises at the quality. For the price I felt it wouldn't be as sturdy as my shop equipment but it will be on my list when I need any more for the shop. It is sturdy and comes with an arm and grooming noose. Deliver was two day. Can't ask for anything more. I have Shih Tzus but I would have no problem putting larger dogs on it.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna M. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it once, and it worked well for my 25 pound sheltie. The only thing I have a problem with was the legs were hard to lock when I first set it up. I left the table up instead of folding it back down when not in use because I don't want to try and relock the legs again. It's a very sturdy table for the money, but I would not want to move it around a lot because I'm a small person and it's pretty heavy for me to move.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W.

customer_reviews.title: Great table for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have a rotten Scottish Terrier that no breeder has been able to groom. After the third time of him coming home half shaved I decided to just try and do it myself (couldn't look any worse.) I bought this table and it arrived very quickly. It was very simple to set up and not as heavy as I had thought it would be based on other reviews. It worked great and my dog finally got the haircut he needed. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I didn't give a 5 start was because it was missing the clamp and the arm was little bend but I contacted Amazon customer services and they paid for a new arm and clamp so I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional groomer and I am really impress with the quality of this table. The only reason I didn't give a 5 start was because it was missing the clamp and the arm was little bend but I contacted Amazon customer services and they paid for a new arm and clamp so I'm very happy with my purchase. I highly recommend for anyone but keep in mind the table is little heavy so if you're planning take places that might be a problem for you!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table but poor quality/ cheap harness included with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly. Lightweight. The only complaint is the grooming harness that was included with this purchase is so thin and of such poor quality it broke after one use. Luckily I had read about the poor quality of this harness from another reviewer and purchased a better harness so I had that on hand. I have 2 dogs, 55lbs and 68lbs and the harness that was included with purchase was definitely not strong enough for my boys. For small dog probably ok. I recommend the table.
customer_reviews.author: Berkeley Girl

customer_reviews.title: 3 Dogs Approved!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs just love standing on this table while I groom them. It keeps them still while I have them on the leash. I have a Whippet, Schnauzer and a Springer Spaniel and they all fit on the table. Perfect size! It is also less harsh on my back not having to bend down all the time. The only complaint I have the legs keeps folding inside. I wish they have placed a lock system to keep the leg from folding.
customer_reviews.author: AshZoeWill

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stable, easy to configure.
customer_reviews.text: We use this with our 20-pound dogs. It's probably a little larger than we absolutely require, but I like the size. There's nothing that can make an uncooperative dog want to get groomed, but the little bit of extra size means you don't worry about the dog stepping off the edge of the table and having difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This would also be great for people who want to groom at home
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this as a back up drying table for my salon. This is definitely a high quality table. Especially the table top. I can’t wait to try it out tomorrow at work. This would also be great for people who want to groom at home.
customer_reviews.author: MissCole7

customer_reviews.title: VERY Study, surprising quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is very, very sturdy and solid. I wasn't expecting such good quality. It's strong.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta M.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, sturdy table. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty outstanding grooming table. Very heavy duty. It sits pretty high, so if your dog is a jumper with leg problems you might want to exercise a little extra caution.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Whittington

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up, works well for my Doodle puppy, she's about 40lbs. I got a seperate neck and haunch holder, because the one it comes with just sucks.
customer_reviews.author: dbtorr

customer_reviews.title: GoPetClub Dog grooming table
customer_reviews.text: Table was delivered in a timely manner and well packaged. No problems setting table up and attaching grooming arm, set up in 5 minutes. Table is very sturdy and just the right height for grooming my 13lb Cockapoo, and so much easier than sitting on the floor. If you are looking for a grooming table at a great price, you can't go wrong! I highly reccommend this 24"x36", 31" high grooming table with grooming arm.
customer_reviews.author: DawnC50

customer_reviews.title: Just like the groomers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Sturdy and just like the groomers. My babies have their spa day and my back gets a break when I blow dry them and trim them up. The adjustable arm is sturdy and works great. It folds up but watch your fingers when you're collapsing the legs. I have a 23lb bichon/poodle mix and a 15 lb jack russell/maltese mix that fit no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for HQ

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It makes grooming my dogs so much easier. It is very secure and on the heavy side. It folds up nicely for easy storage.I feel good about grooming my pets on this table. I am glad i bought this Pet Grooming Table.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: An awesome table
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome professional style table which is light enough to carry around either to store in a closet when not needed, or to take to your next show. It is a stable table when set up and the surface is great. I'd certainly buy it again, but I expect it to last for years and years of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: ThreeEngies

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: I love the table. The arm is fine but I don’t like the way tie attaches .
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great table for a standard poodle!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a grooming table for my standard poodle since taking her to the groomers every month was out of my budget. This table is the perfect hight and length for her. The only thing that I wish it had was a handle on the side for carrying it when the legs are folded.
customer_reviews.author: zaise

customer_reviews.title: works well is sturdy to hold a boxer and malinois
customer_reviews.text: works well is sturdy to hold a boxer and malinois, the only change i would make is a better noose as that one is so loose and cheaply made it comes apart with each use. I ended up buying the noose holder separately.
customer_reviews.author: RN1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I groom about 16 dogs regularly. Nothing over 35 lbs. Perfect. Sturdy. I love that it folds up. Heavier than I thought but I can move it fine. Get a different noose- the one it comes with is a pain- too thin, doesn't stay put unless you tie it in knots. Great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jen T

customer_reviews.title: Very good but needs better restraint device.
customer_reviews.text: The table is study and more than adequate for my small dog. The non-slip cover was very helpful. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 Star rating is because I think the lease to restrain the dog was a poor set up. It was difficult to adjust comfortably for security. I had trouble making it tight enough and yet not strangle him.
customer_reviews.author: Sally S

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is really nice. It is very sturdy and has a rubberized top to it which is perfect for animals to be secure on the table. I also purchased the neck and haunch holders to go with the table as the table does not come with a haunch holder. The table looks to be a great size for small to medium dogs which is exactly what I needed it for. I love the table!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great Essential Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: This is my first grooming table and I am very pleased with it. It is a nice height, good quality, and folds up nicely to tuck away when not in use. The non-slip pad on top is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected!
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazingly sturdy and we'll made. I bought it to replace an old table that broke and honestly wasn't expecting much more then plywood with anti-slip covering on it and man was I wrong. I feel comfortable putting a large dog on this table without it shaking or breaking under the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to set up, easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 10-15 lb dogs. Sturdy, easy to set up and to store. Also great work table for household projects, like restraining my shades.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Back saver when brushing or grooming
customer_reviews.text: The table has been pretty sturdy for my poodles. It has really helped me with keeping them still while I brush them. The only thing that is not good quality is the groom loop. It is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Portable.  Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. Very sturdy. Portable and a bit heavy, but since its so sturdy I don't mind. Its wide and I can put a large size dog in it without problems. The arm is sturdy and adjustable. Wish it came with the harness, but that I brought separately so for that fact I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Drey B

customer_reviews.title: Great table for dog grooming
customer_reviews.text: We love this table. Makes grooming our dog so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: vickie h

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: First use of this table made grooming my dog so much easier. Table is very sturdy and my dog feels safe on it. My table arrived with a bit of damage on one corner...the edge of the table was damaged on the corner.
customer_reviews.author: CTuck

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: When I unpacked this table, several screws were out. I thought nothing of it and just put them back in. I used it once for my own dog and more screws fell out and she doesn't move at all on the table. The grooming loop also broke while she was standing still. Table looks high quality but it's deceiving. One screw was also rusted. The company did refund my money so that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of this table. I have an Irish Setter that I take to shows and use this table to do my touch up grooming on the show grounds. If I were using this as my regular at home grooming table I would purchase a larger size as she just fits on it with no extra room. But I went smaller as I needed it to be very portable and not too heavy so I can carry and set it up myself.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: awful grooming helper is cheap and bar wobbles
customer_reviews.text: very un sturdy have been trying to fix it since I bought it and it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Brand New, Blue Harness broke after first 20 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: The table is sturdy, but the harness to hold my 22lb dog broke after the first 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lissia

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! The only negative is the leash, but that can be worked around.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Grooming table
customer_reviews.text: Great quality heavy duty , glad I paid a little extra for the 36 inch .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mozes

customer_reviews.title: This table is nice and sturdy and a good fit for my English ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is nice and sturdy and a good fit for my English Cocker Spaniels. The only drawback for me is that it's fairly heavy. I'd planned to take it to my backyard every few days for a good bruscnh-out of the dogs but it's heavier than I can handle going up and down. steps. It's set up in the garage instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Go Pet Club Grooming Table
customer_reviews.text: Durable, sturdy/love it! I set the table up in my utility area and use it daily. As a side note, it is very heavy so for ladies like myself you may need assistance in setting it up. Not something that I would want to set up and take down after each use. Would highly recommend the unit/company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The table is incredibly sturdy. You can easily hack saw the legs and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for us because my dog is too crazy to get on this table. But, I am giving this product a 5 star for the quality. The table is incredibly sturdy. You can easily hack saw the legs and put the rubber feet back on if you want it lower.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I'm a professional groomer who uses an electric table at work, got this table to groom family and friends dogs at home. Worked great for grooming my lhasa mix, and was able to get our german Shorthaired pointer on it for toenails as well (45 pounds). I got a different grooming loop because I didn't like the one included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality for such a fair price. Adjusts to a wide range of dogs as big as our large Standard Poodle.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne Craigo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We have a miniature Golden Doodle who weighs between 26-28 lbs. We did not find the neck lease flimsy at all.
customer_reviews.author: LCP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy table. I use it all the time for grooming small dogs and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Real good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table and clamp. Other reviews rated the table and clamp as sub-par. But I find the table to be heavy duty. It easily supports a 80 to 100 pound dog.
customer_reviews.author: FNP Tim

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money for the table. The lanyard arm is a little flimsy but overall the table is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid grooming table
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, sturdy table that isn’t too heavy to move around. I’ve used it for brushing my Aussie and for doing nails. High quality product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Milina

customer_reviews.title: Answered prayer!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 48" table with the separate sturdier leashes for my 50 lb goldendoodle. Used it for the first time today. Perfect size. Grooming, especially ear cleaning, has always ended in tears for both of us and occasionally minor injuries. The guilt has been terrible. Using the table plus treats is a blessed miracle. Being restrained seems to calm her and I was able to do everything I needed to do-- a first!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Hill

customer_reviews.title: This table is perfect and just what I needed to brush and dry ...
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect and just what I needed to brush and dry my two fur babies. Its good for the price but I am not sure if this is ok for a professional groomer. Its perfect for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for my Labradoodle. Sturdy and the non-slip feature is great. I am 6ft. and the height of the table made it easy to get around the dog easily. Would suggest purchasing a "no sit" harness for better control. Originally ordered the 32 inch but it was not shipped and I was told they were "out of stock" and decided to get the larger one. I'm glad I did this one has that little bit of extra room that makes it perfect for a larger dog (mine is 75 lbs.)
customer_reviews.author: Thom P. Rickert

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price!!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: This table works great. The non slip surface allows my dog to jump on and off regardless if it is wet or dry. Great value for the price. Also it is lighter in weight than a smaller table that I purchased last year. The clamp is a bit weak in that it is plastic and wobbly so I will use the clamp from my other table and the dog lead was to long my Alaskan Malamute broke it after the first day. A nylon choke collar connected to the arm works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Research First

customer_reviews.title: Grooming Table is a back saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very strong. Great height for trimming your dogs. I was apprehensive about spending the money on the table. I was sending my dogs out to be groomed, with this table and the other equipment needed to groom the dogs it pays for itself the first year. So happy with this table. If your dog is around 50lbs you may want to invest in the larger table so that your dog has a little more room on the it. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: I am only 5'5" but this table is not high ...
customer_reviews.text: I am only 5'5" but this table is not high enough for me. My back was absolutely killing me from having to bend over constantly while grooming my three scnauzers. Previously I was using my kitchen counter which is several inches higher.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My back no longer hurts from using a card table and my dogs feet no longer slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Wgrod1

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional groomer, I just groom my dog myself. This table is light weight and very stable. It has saved my back.
customer_reviews.author: Little Shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Buy another restraint, the one that came with table is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet C. Koback

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value, very sturdy for my 50 LB Portuguese Water Dog
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Steinfeldt

customer_reviews.title: This is great for grooming pets
customer_reviews.text: This is great for grooming pets. It keeps them still and cooperative. It makes for a much easier job that is so much better on your back. The table is very sturdy. This is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Janill

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height and size to groom my 3 Pembroke welsh corgis. Table folds up easily for storage yet sturdy/strong enough to not feel unsafe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pongo's mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice, sturdy table for grooming
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, sturdy table for grooming. The top of the table has a nice, non slip surface, so the dog stays put. It's a little heavy to move around, but that lends to its sturdiness. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Solid and stable
customer_reviews.text: We originally purchased a Master Equipment grooming table, but returned it because the surface was too slippery. This table feels a lot more stable / solid than the previous table, and also a lot less slippery. It is quite difficult to clean the fur off, because it does stick to the table a bit, but this is preferable to having the dog falling over all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I ordered this table. It has made grooming my two Malteses so much easier...and most importantly no more back pain from all the bending I was having to do before. I've been using it for six months and wish I would've bought this years ago. Perfect size for Maltese dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 months now and am pretty happy with it. The table has a nice grippy feel to it so the dogs don't slide around and it comes apart/breaks down for easy transport when needed.
customer_reviews.author: seri

customer_reviews.title: super
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - did great job! What more can I say! Just as previous reviews indicated strong, sturdy table for 20 and 30 pound cockers; easy to assemble. Great size for cockers. Would recommend this to all home groomers!
customer_reviews.author: Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturday, can be used for anu size dog
customer_reviews.author: sravani

customer_reviews.title: Super great and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: What a great grooming table. Very sturdy and well built. Wishing I would have gotten it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Emery

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected, but a little heavy to lift
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY pleased with the quality of the table and arm, and the no-slip pad. Makes grooming a breeze! It's just a bit heavy to cart around.
customer_reviews.author: Sue in NJ

product_meta.title: Go Pet Club Pet Dog Grooming Table with Arm, 36-Inch
product_meta.description: The Go Pet Club Grooming Table is a great investment for any professional or in-home groomers. All of our tables come with a grooming arm and leash loop that is easily attached to our table tops with a clamp. Our table tops have a deluxe aluminum alloy edging paired with a water proof top layer, preventing absorption and warping of the wood underneath. All of our tables come with a pebbled, non-slip surface to keep your pet safe while you work. Our durable and convenient grooming table contains a static free surface, making your table easily cleaned and maintained. The Go Pet Club Grooming Tables are perfect for home or professional use.
feature_bullets: Table features strong goal post style legs with rubber capped feet, Includes adjustable grooming arm, adjusts to 40" high
Goal post style legs allow for easy fold up during transport and for added stability, Static Free surface

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
